snippet.title: TOKOYO: The Tower of Perpetuity - Nintendo Switch & STEAM Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
TOKOYO: The Tower of Perpetuity is a unique 2D action roguelike with some social elements set in a tower that changes everyday.
Featuring five unique playable characters, aim for the top of this ever-changing tower!

Coming to Nintendo Switch and Steam on June 2nd!

■Nintendo eShop: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/tokoyo-tower-of-perpetuity-switch/
■Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1393420/
■Developer: //commentout　
■Publisher: PLAYISM
■Official Websites
https://commentout.info/tokoyo/
https://playism.com/game/tokoyo/

© 2022 //commentout Licensed to and published by Active Gaming Media Inc.
